author: Simon Kent, Simon Kent
title: WHO Chief Sends Lady Gaga Birthday Greetings and Praise for Coronavirus 'Support'
description: The embattled chief of the World Health Organization (WHO), Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus, took time out from combating the spread of the Chinese coronavirus on Saturday to take a telephone call from pop star Lady Gaga and offer her birthday greetings and thanks…
